MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the LL54 postcode area of Caernarfon affecting a number of properties in the local area. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1:30pm in order to carry out repair work in safety on the overhead line network , and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:49pm on the 30th April 2021.
